actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution to allow the parties in the case of New Mexico v Aamodt to have access to certain records of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Allows the parties in the case of New Mexico vs. Aamodt to have access to those records of the House of Representatives Committee on Indian Affairs for 1932 and 1933 which relate to: (1) H.R. 7535, introduced on January 12, 1932; (2) H.R. 9071, introduced on February 9, 1932; or (3) the Act of May 31, 1933, enacting H.R. 4014, introduced on March 22, 1933.

titles.title: A resolution to allow the parties in the case of New Mexico v Aamodt to have access to certain records of the House of Representatives.
